name: Joseph G. MULVANEY, Appellant, v. DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA and Kevin P. Howard, Appellees

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
parties: Joseph G. MULVANEY, Appellant, v. DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA and Kevin P. Howard, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Order of the Superior Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Michael A. Della Vecchia, Evashavik, Capone and Della Vecchia, Pittsburgh, for Joseph G. Mulvaney.
Thomas M. Fallert, Dickie, McCamey & Chilcote, Pittsburgh, for Kevin P. Howard.
casebody.head_matter:
541 A.2d 742
Joseph G. MULVANEY, Appellant, v. DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA and Kevin P. Howard, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 9, 1988.
Decided May 27, 1988.
Michael A. Della Vecchia, Evashavik, Capone and Della Vecchia, Pittsburgh, for Joseph G. Mulvaney.
Thomas M. Fallert, Dickie, McCamey & Chilcote, Pittsburgh, for Kevin P. Howard.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
